definition: corrupt official/grasping functionary/greedy mandarin
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
government official/governmental/official/public/organ of the body/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guan
grasping officials, corrupt mandarins (idiom); abuse and corruption

sentences.english: Any detailed investigation would show true colors of the corrupt offical.
sentences.chinese: 任何細緻的調查都會使這個貪官原形畢露。

sentences.english: The number of corrupt officials fleeing China reflects the government's serious attitude about the crackdown on corruption.
sentences.chinese: 逃離中國的貪官數量反映了政府打擊貪腐的嚴正態度。

sentences.english: The money was all pocketed by corrupt officials.
sentences.chinese: 這些錢都進了貪官污吏的腰包。

sentences.english: I don't intimidate the public, I only intimidate those corrupt officials.
sentences.chinese: 我從來不嚇唬老百姓，只嚇唬那些貪官污吏。

sentences.english: Investigation of fraud was their commission.
The corrupt officials tried to sidetrack our investigation.
sentences.chinese: 這些貪官污吏企圖岔開我們的調查。

sentences.english: There are a lot of corrupt officials in the government.
sentences.chinese: 政府中的貪官污吏大有人在。

sentences.english: Although it had many corrupt officials, the Kuomintang managed enterprises better than we do.
sentences.chinese: 國民黨貪官污吏多得很，但是辦企業比我們好。

sentences.english: So the prevention of the corruption must start from the point of preventing avidity.
sentences.chinese: 貪官的預防，必須從預防貪慾開始。

sentences.english: The crime of the corrupt officials must be exposed without any reserve.
sentences.chinese: 這些貪官污吏所犯下的罪行必需毫無保存的被揭露。

sentences.english: The corrupt official stood in the dock.
These corrupted officials are bad to the bone.
An official has to have been convicted for a portrait to be done.
sentences.chinese: 肖像畫中的官員都必須是被定罪的貪官。

sentences.english: Should eliminate these corrupt officials thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 是該徹底清除這些貪官污吏了。

sentences.english: We'll accuse the corrupt official, no matter what cost is involved.
sentences.chinese: 無論花多大代價，我們也要控告那個貪官。

sentences.english: Our society is to have developed , the corrupt officials foolish people propagates and then self embezzles wantonly.
sentences.chinese: 是發展了，貪官們愚民宣傳然後自己大肆貪污。

definition: path/conduct/behavior
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
spy
to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
to incite trouble/to stir up havoc
to accumulate wealth/to rake in money
to execute (a condemned criminal)
to betray one's country
an execution/to put sb to death
to be corrupt/corruption/to embezzle
multi-level marketing
abbr. for 勞動改造|劳动改造[lao2 dong4 gai3 zao4]/reform through labor/laogai (prison camp)
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
two-China (policy)
